properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 1:14AM EST until February 7 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Jackson KY
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers
in Kentucky...

The Cumberland River at Baxter

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

The Cumberland River at Pineville
The Levisa Fork Big Sandy River at Pikeville

...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

The North Fork Kentucky River at Hazard

The Flood Warning continues for
The North Fork Kentucky River at Hazard.
* at 12:30 AM Friday the stage was 24.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river crested at 26 feet and is now falling. The river
will continue to fall to below flood stage Friday morning.
* At 25.0 feet...Flooding begins in some basements.
properties.instruction:
Continue to monitor NOAA weather radio or your favorite local media
outlet for additional information. If you are in areas affected by
this forecast take necessary precautions.

The next update will be issued by 11 am Friday.

A Flood Warning means that flooding is occurring or is imminent.
